entry.string: There are #(1) courses matching these selection criteria at the moment
entry.translation: Υπάρχουν #(1) μαθήματα που ταιριάζουν στα κριτήρια επιλογής αυτή την στιγμή

entry.string:
Some examples : (assuming your users have read access by default)

- In order to allow 'Friends' to submit News courses (and only that), define a privilege 'SubmitNews' (or whatever name you prefer), and choose the publication type "News courses" (instance 1:All:All:All) and access level "Submit (Comment)" above. Press "Finish and Apply to Privilege", and then assign that privilege to the 'Friends' role.

- In order to stop 'Strangers' from viewing Documents, define some privilege 'NoDocuments' with publication type "Documents" (instance 2:All:All:All) and access level "No Access". Then assign that privilege to the 'Strangers' role.

- ...

Note: if you want to deny access to all courses in a particular category with ID 123, you can also define a privilege for module 'categories', component 'Category', category name 'All' and category ID '123'. This will remove the category from the courses map and categories navigation as well.
